461bc8b3-c18c-4aa7-b2c5-af5ae9f6da09.description: Earners of the Facebook Social Media Marketing badge have developed a deeper understanding of the role social media plays in a digital marketing strategy. They have been given the opportunity to test their social media skills and create a real ad campaign on the Facebook platform.
461bc8b3-c18c-4aa7-b2c5-af5ae9f6da09.name: Facebook Social Media Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Facebook Social Media Marketing course

80b6f643-3191-45c6-b305-57dffee185cd.description: This course prepares students to enter the healthcare industry as a registered ECG technician and participate in a nationally recognized certiﬁcation exam. Students learn basic operation and performance for conducting the ECG procedure, recognize common dysrhythmias and the signiﬁcance of waveforms produced by a 12-lead ECG. Students also learn related terminology and the anatomy and physiology of the circulatory system.
80b6f643-3191-45c6-b305-57dffee185cd.name: Electrocardiography Technician

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

alignments.name: Commission on Accreditation of Allied Health Education Programs (CAAHEP)
alignments.description: Assessments map to the cognitive objectives, psychomotor competencies and affective behaviors as identified by the CAAHEP Standards and Guidelines and Medical Assisting Education Review Board (MAERB) Core Curriculum Competency Requirements for Medical Assisting Educational Programs.

badge_template_activities.title: Identify the function of electrocardiography (ECG) in the healthcare setting.
Demonstrate competency in OSHA Regulations and HIPAA Compliance.
Demonstrate proper procedure for recording and printing a standard 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG).
Identify the role of the ECG Technician in assisting with ECG assessment and interpretation.
Identify quality assurance practices and liability risk management as they apply to healthcare.
Apply the skills required to project an image of professionalism to include appearance, conduct, punctuality, competency, and continuing education.
Successfully complete nationally recognized electrocardiography technician certification exams.

e58a73da-36c2-4314-bff2-35a77d361f8a.description: This course will teach students multiple programming languages in multiple learning formats. Students will become proficient with many common tools used in the industry today, such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, mySQL, and WordPress.
e58a73da-36c2-4314-bff2-35a77d361f8a.name: Full Stack Web Development Course

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Learn to work in an agile development environment.
Front-end technologies: HTML, CSS, ReactJs, Bootstrap, jQuery.
Design, implement, and organize a functional website from both user and business perspectives.
Evaluate code for validity and structure that meets industry standards.
Test code for browser and device compatibility.
Learn to work with Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).
Introduction to search engine optimization, analytics and data analysis.

17aa4cb0-cbfb-41d3-bf2f-df10e68d8b2f.description: This course introduces students to the factors contributing to contamination of food and food preparation facilities. Managerial considerations will be discussed, as well as cleaning, sanitizing agents, approved building materials and state and federal governance. A nationally recognized certification exam will be administered at the conclusion of the course. Serv Safe Certification. This course is required to graduate with a degree in Culinary Arts or Hotel Management.
17aa4cb0-cbfb-41d3-bf2f-df10e68d8b2f.name: Serv Safe Sanitation

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Distinguish the factors contributing to biological, chemical and physical contamination of food.
Identify microorganisms which are related to food spoilage and food-borne illness, describe requirements and methods for growth.
Identify symptoms common to food-borne illnesses and how these can be prevented.
Understand acceptable procedures when preparing potentially hazardous foods to include time/temperature principles.
State the procedures for the proper receipt, storage and preparation and service of fresh and frozen food.
Identify the physical characteristics of materials needed for the construction and maintenance of a safe and sanitary food service environment.
List the factors necessary for managing a safe and sanitary food service environment and identify Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points (HACCP) principles.
Successfully complete the EF/NRA Sanitation Certification Exam with a minimum score of 70%.
Become familiar with Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS).

a6e66777-4c02-4782-b2f7-0e32c5fc2837.description: This course prepares students to enter the healthcare industry as a certified phlebotomist and participate in a nationally recognized phlebotomy certification exam. Students learn the processes, procedures and techniques for collecting blood specimens and complete 45 clinical externship hours acquiring direct patient-care experience. Students also learn related terminology, anatomy and physiology, laboratory safety, order of draw, and other established regulations and standards.
a6e66777-4c02-4782-b2f7-0e32c5fc2837.name: Certified Phlebotomy Technician

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

alignments.name: Commission on Accreditation of Allied Health Education Programs (CAAHEP)
alignments.description: Assessments map to the cognitive objectives, psychomotor competencies and affective behaviors as identified by the CAAHEP Standards and Guidelines and Medical Assisting Education Review Board (MAERB) Core Curriculum Competency Requirements for Medical Assisting Educational Programs.

badge_template_activities.title: Identify the function of phlebotomy in the healthcare setting which includes hospitals, clinics, and physician offices.
Demonstrate competency in Bloodborne Pathogens, OSHA Regulations, Infection Control, Laboratory Safety and HIPAA Compliance.
Practice venipuncture and capillary puncture techniques by selecting appropriate veins and demonstrating proper collection techniques by venipuncture on adults.
Recognize the need for specialized collection techniques, the complications and special considerations associated with blood collection and micro-collection.
Identify quality assurance practices and liability risk management as they apply to healthcare.
Apply the skills required to project an image of professionalism to include appearance, conduct, punctuality, competency and continuing education.
Successfully complete nationally recognized phlebotomy technician certification exams.

cb0332a1-fc32-48f7-bcdf-b74f6414dd07.description: Earners of this badge have a basic understanding of the foundational concepts of Digital Marketing. Earners have developed an understanding of marketing in the context of a business. They have been given the framework needed to think about concepts such as segmentation, targeting, value propositions, and metrics.
cb0332a1-fc32-48f7-bcdf-b74f6414dd07.name: Facebook Foundations and Strategy of Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Facebook Foundations and Strategy of Marketing course.
Analyze and create a digital marketing plan for a chosen company.

89d7e3b8-9cfe-4b23-a965-49f61341dbea.description: Successful completion of the Emergency Medical Technology (EMT) Exam Qualification micro-credential provides the earner with the skills and knowledge to prepare them to take the New York State Bureau of Emergency Medical Services certification exam and the National Registry of Emergency Medical Technician's Exam. Upon passing the NYS EMT exam, EMTs can begin working on an ambulance in NYS.
89d7e3b8-9cfe-4b23-a965-49f61341dbea.name: Emergency Medical Technology Exam Qualification

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8 credit EMT course with an overall average of 80% or greater.
Successfully pass all psychomotor skill evaluations including the New York State Emergency Medical Technology Certification Psychomotor Skill Evaluation.
Complete the 2-hour NYS Mandated Reporter training for "Child Abuse and Neglect" along with submitting the certificate of course completion.
Complete the 2-hour "FEMA IS-100: Introduction to Incident Command System" along with submitting the certificate of course completion.
Complete the 3.5-hour "FEMA IS-700: "National Incident Management Systems" along with submitting the certificate of course completion.
Complete a 4-hour Hazardous Material First Responder Awareness Level along with submitting the certificate of course completion.
Complete a minimum of 10 hours observation in an emergency department, ambulance, and urgent care setting and document at least ten patient contacts.

8865a7d0-7f89-4737-8865-193ede2ca4d0.description: Earners of the Facebook Marketing Analytics and Performance Optimization badge have developed the ability to calculate key marketing metrics and determine strategic marketing optimization decisions. They could A/B test various elements of marketing efforts to increase conversion rates and understand the factors that drive conversion and opportunities to optimize marketing performance.
8865a7d0-7f89-4737-8865-193ede2ca4d0.name: Facebook Marketing Analytics and Performance Optimization

issuer.summary: issued by SUNY Erie Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Facebook Social Media Marketing course.
